alejandrofan2.burgerRun.framework

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • alejandrofan2.burgerRun.framework.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of creating animations reproducing the images that we pass to the constructor.
    Author:
    alejandrofan2
